alert.headline: NWS Boston (Southeast New England)
alert.desc:
...ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER POTENTIAL FOR TODAY...
High temperatures in the upper 40s to lower 50s combined with a
very dry air mass will support minimum afternoon relative
humidities between 20 and 30 percent across Hartford, Tolland and
Windham Counties. Southwest wind gusts will also range between 20
to 25 mph. Incorporating input from the Connecticut Department of
Energy and Environmental Protection`s Division of Forestry,
elevated fire weather potential is expected today in Hartford,
Tolland and Windham Counties in northern Connecticut. Use caution
when handling ignition sources, including but not limited to
matches and cigarettes.

alert.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 2:54AM EDT by NWS
alert.areas: Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent
alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service
alert.desc:
...ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER POTENTIAL FOR TODAY...
High temperatures in the upper 40s to lower 50s combined with a
very dry air mass will support minimum afternoon relative
humidities between 20 and 30 percent in Kent and Providence
Counties today. Southwest wind gusts will also range between 20
to 25 mph. Incorporating input from the Rhode Island Department of
Forestry, elevated fire weather potential is expected today
across Kent and Providence Counties. Use caution when handling
ignition sources, including but not limited to matches and
cigarettes.

alert.headline: NWS Boston (Southeast New England)
alert.desc:
...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS
EVENING...
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
2 to 4 feet.
* WHERE...Portions of Massachusetts coastal waters and Rhode
Island coastal waters.
* WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening.
* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
